about.label: Who We Are
about.title: More Than Just Code
about.subtitle: We are a collective of visionaries, engineers, and creatives dedicated to building the future.
about.description: At Ashen Software, we believe in the power of technology to transform lives and businesses. Our culture is built on innovation, transparency, and a relentless pursuit of excellence.

faq.label: Questions
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our process and how we can help your business grow.
faq.q1: What software development services do you offer?
faq.a1: We offer custom software development, web and mobile applications, technology consulting, and legacy system modernization.
faq.q2: What is your work process like?
faq.a2: We work with agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban). We start with a discovery and design phase, followed by iterative development sprints.
faq.q3: Do you offer post-launch support and maintenance?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer support and maintenance plans to ensure your software continues to function perfectly.
faq.a4: We use a robust modern stack including React, Node.js, Python, AWS, Azure, and mobile technologies like React Native and Flutter.
faq.a5: Absolutely. We respect your privacy and intellectual property.

contact.title: Quote a project with us!
contact.description: Ready to turn your idea into reality? Share your vision with us, and we'll provide the technology, strategy, and expertise to build something extraordinary together.
contact.project-label: What is the name of your project/idea?
contact.message-label: A few words about your project/idea*

service-web-development-description: We create websites and applications that work perfectly on any device. From corporate pages to complex platforms, we make your digital presence professional and effective.
service-mobile-development-description: We develop applications for smartphones and tablets that your customers can download from official stores. Solutions that work on both Android and iPhone.
service-desktop-apps-description: We create computer programs that install directly on Windows, Mac, or Linux. Perfect for businesses that need specific tools for their daily work.
service-iot-solutions-description: We connect smart devices to the internet to automate your home or business. From sensors to control systems, we make technology work for you.
service-game-development-description: We create video games from scratch for mobile, PC, and consoles. From casual games to immersive experiences, we bring your vision to life.
service-artificial-intelligence-descript: We implement intelligent systems that can learn and make decisions. From chatbots to predictive analysis, AI can revolutionize your business.
service-machine-learning-description: We develop systems that learn from data to improve continuously. Perfect for companies that want to leverage their information to make better decisions.
service-deep-learning-description: We create advanced neural networks that can process complex information like images, text, and audio. Ideal for projects requiring sophisticated analysis.
service-data-science-description: We transform your data into valuable information that drives intelligent decisions. From automated reports to interactive dashboards, we make numbers speak.
service-blockchain-description: We implement blockchain technology to create secure and transparent systems. Perfect for companies needing traceability, smart contracts, or cryptocurrencies.
service-automation-description: We automate repetitive processes so your team can focus on what matters. From administrative tasks to complex workflows, technology works 24/7.
faq-q1: What software development services do you offer?
faq-a1: We offer custom software development, web and mobile applications, technology consulting, and legacy system modernization.
faq-q2: What is your work process like?
faq-a2: We work with agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban). We start with a discovery and design phase, followed by iterative development sprints.
faq-q3: Do you offer post-launch support and maintenance?
faq-a3: Yes, we offer support and maintenance plans to ensure your software continues to function perfectly.
faq-a4: We use a robust modern stack including React, Node.js, Python, AWS, Azure, and mobile technologies like React Native and Flutter.
faq-a5: Absolutely. We respect your privacy and intellectual property.
contact-description: Ready to transform your business? Send us a message and let's discuss your project.
about-hero-desc: A collective of visionaries, engineers, and creatives dedicated to building technology that transcends boundaries and redefines what's possible.
about-mission-desc: To empower businesses by bridging the gap between complex technology and human-centric design. We build digital ecosystems that are not just functional, but transformative, scalable, and intuitive.
about-vision-desc: To be the global standard for digital excellence, where code meets creativity to solve the world's most pressing challenges. We envision a future where technology is seamless, invisible, and boundless.
about-culture-subheading: Our values are the bedrock of our innovation. They guide how we build, how we partner, and how we grow.
about-culture-transparency-desc: Open code, open communication. We believe trust is built on clarity.
about-culture-innovation-desc: We don't just follow trends; we set them. Constantly exploring the new.
about-culture-agility-desc: Fast execution without compromising quality. We adapt to conquer.
about-culture-empathy-desc: Technology for people. We design with the human experience at the core.
